caption.center: ANGELO FREEMAN, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Brevard County, John M. Harris, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James S. Purdy, Public Defender, and Michael S. Becker, Assistant Public Defender, Daytona Beach, for Appellant.
No Appearance for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
SAWAYA, TORPY and COHEN, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED DISPOSED OF.
